definition: a thing should not be attempted more than three times (idiom)/don't repeat the same mistake again and again/bad things don't happen more than three times
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: The new legislation would have operated under a "three strikes" system.
sentences.chinese: 新的立法將在“事不過三”體系下運作。

sentences.english: Don't be late again. Three strikes and you're out.

definition: to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
to quit while one is ahead (idiom)/to know when to stop
to get straight to the point (idiom)
strike first and gain the upper hand (idiom, martial arts term); Making the first move is an advantage.
(metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath
to be an eyesore/(fig.) to spoil the fun/to be a wet blanket
(of marriage or business partners) to break up (idiom)/to separate
lit. one palm alone cannot clap (proverb)/fig. it takes two persons to start a dispute/it takes two to tango/it's difficult to achieve anything without support
pinyin: yi1 ge5 ba1 zhang3 pai1 bu4 xiang3
